page.title: 02BRISTOL,ST.WERBURGH'S FARM
page.content: On May 1 we went to city farm.First we saw 3 Jacob sheep with 4 black lambs. In with them there were some hens with lovely brown feathers and one white cockerel.Then we saw the nanny goats with their white kids.The kids were lively and curious.They ate paper sucked Paul's pen and jumped off the bench whilst body popping.One even ate Miss Brazier's skirt!Another escaped from the pen! Then we went to see the rabbits,there were lots of little dwarf rabbits and one big rabbit.The man showed us one of the dwarf rabbits We all stroked it.It was brown and we all wanted one. Some of us went to see the pigs.There were some small pigs feeding from their mother they were black and white. It was all great fun!
